title: The Map of Mathematics
description: A beautiful visual summary of all branches of math — from algebra to topology.

title: Explorable Explanations by Nicky Case
description: Interactive stories and simulations that teach complex systems and human behavior.

title: Internet Archive
description: A vast library of free books, movies, software, and websites — the digital time machine.

title: Seeing Theory
description: An interactive guide to probability and statistics from Brown University.

title: Inferno Operating System
description: A distributed operating system that pushes portability and modular computing to the extreme.

title: Ken Thompson
description: The computing pioneer who co-created UNIX, B, and Go — foundational work for modern software.

title: Dmitry Belyayev (Zoologist)
description: The scientist who domesticated silver foxes, uncovering deep links between evolution and behavior.

title: Explore Software Defined Radio
description: A practical guide to building and understanding SDR systems for real-world applications.

title: OpenWebRX
description: A web-based SDR receiver that lets you listen to the radio spectrum through your browser.

title: SQL Antipatterns Volume 1
description: Learn about common SQL design mistakes and how to avoid them effectively.

title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
description: The definitive guide to building reliable, scalable, and maintainable data systems.

title: OpenVINS
description: An open-source visual-inertial navigation system framework for accurate localization.

title: Robot_Localization (ROS Package)
description: A state estimation package in ROS that fuses IMU, odometry, and GPS data.

title: Variational Autoencoders (VAE)
description: A foundational concept in generative AI combining reconstruction and KL divergence loss.

title: Local Exchange Trading System (LETS)
description: Community-based barter systems built around mutual credit and blockchain ideas.

title: Sneakernet
description: A communication network where data is transferred physically using storage media like USB drives.

description: A computational approach to simulate complex systems using autonomous agents.

title: Precision vs Recall
description: A concise explanation of the key trade-off in classification and decision systems.

title: Ham Radio Digital Modes
description: How amateur radio operators send text and data across long distances with minimal bandwidth.

title: Crime Control Department (CCD) Analysis
description: A critical reflection on the emergence of parallel justice systems and citizen trust.
